Class ActiveActorDestructible

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActorDestructible
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
FighterPlane, Projectile
public abstract class ActiveActorDestructible extends ActiveActor implements Destructible
Represents a destructible active actor in the game.

This class extends ActiveActor and provides additional functionality for handling destruction, collisions, and damage.

    • ActiveActorDestructible

      public ActiveActorDestructible(String imageName, int imageHeight, double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs a ActiveActorDestructible with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      imageName - the name of the image file
      imageHeight - the height of the image
      initialXPos - the initial X-coordinate of the actor
      initialYPos - the initial Y-coordinate of the actor

      public abstract void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the actor. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define specific movement behavior.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActor

    • updateActor

      public abstract void updateActor()
      Updates the state of the actor.

      This method must be implemented by subclasses to define behavior such as animations or interactions during each frame of the game.

    • fireProjectile

      public abstract ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile from the actor.

      This method must be implemented by subclasses to define projectile behavior.

      Returns:
      a new ActiveActorDestructible representing the projectile, or null if no projectile is fired

    • takeDamage

      public abstract void takeDamage()
      Takes damage and handles any effects related to being damaged. This method must be implemented by subclasses.
      Specified by:

      Sets the destroyed state of the actor.
      Parameters:
      isDestroyed - true if the actor is destroyed, false otherwise

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      Checks whether the actor is destroyed.
      Returns:
      true if the actor is destroyed, false otherwise

    • getAdjustedBounds

      public javafx.geometry.Bounds getAdjustedBounds()
      Gets the adjusted bounding box of the actor for collision detection.

      Shrinks the original bounds to make collision detection more precise.

      Returns:
      the adjusted Bounds of the actor
